How to configure Ubuntu's swap ?
This tutorial will show you how to configure the swap for Ubuntu.
By d√©fault, Ubuntu is configured to start swapping at merely 60% of remaining ram. On a station fitted with 16Go ram, it only represent 6.4 Go of exploited ram.
1) How to check the swap value cat /proc/sys/vm/swappiness
2) How to modify the swap value vi /etc/sysctl.d/99-Custom.conf
Add there the following lines :
# Fine Swap Tunning vm.swappiness=10
Source : http://doc.ubuntu-fr.org/swap
